definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
CITIC/Chinese International Trust and Investment Company
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Xin4 tuo1 Tou2 zi1 gong1 si1
containing_words.word: 中国国际信托投资公司

pinyin: wai4 shang1 zhi2 jie1 tou2 zi1

definition: to invest in stock/to buy shares

sentences.english: Finland invested in communications and IT at exactly the right time.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰在通讯和信息技术方面的投资可谓恰逢其时。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国在巴西投资兴建了70多家企业。

sentences.english: This will launch XCOR into the emerging space tourism market, estimated at over a half-billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 公司将投资超过五亿美金，来拓展空间旅游市场。

sentences.english: We need to unleash massive private investment in clean energy.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在清洁能源方面发动大量的私人投资。

sentences.english: Please return the form, duly completed and signed, to our Public Office.
sentences.chinese: 请于填妥及签署表格后将其交回卓佳投资者服务处。

sentences.english: Now the number has reached closely to 250, half of which have direct investment in sino-foreign joint ventures.
sentences.chinese: 其中有半数直接投资于中外合资企业。

sentences.english: A big investor is very displeased.
sentences.chinese: 一位大投资者则非常不满。

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在进行投资决定前，你会先详阅综合现金流量表。

sentences.english: In the first part, the author explain the meaning of medium-small investor.
sentences.chinese: 论文第一章首先阐述了投资者和中小投资者的内涵。

sentences.english: In the first part, the author explain the meaning of medium-small investor.
sentences.chinese: 论文第一章首先阐述了投资者和中小投资者的内涵。

sentences.english: But investment in global health is in the national interest too, " Varmus told The Times.
sentences.chinese: 而且投资全球卫生也是国家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: II. 199 foreign business invested commercial enterprises need to make rectifications after sorting out.
sentences.chinese: 经过清理需要进行整改的外商投资商业企业199家。

sentences.english: It is worth rethinking to provide member investment choice.
sentences.chinese: 而提供成员投资选择更值得反思。

sentences.english: When fractional-reserve banks expand credit, malinvestments result.
sentences.chinese: 当部分储备银行扩张信贷是，不正当的投资产生了。

sentences.english: This was key to managing the investors and opening more pockets of finance.
sentences.chinese: 这就是管理投资者和打开更多金主腰包的关键。

definition: to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to invest in stock/to buy shares
